sentences.en: Anne was fond of Tim, though he often annoyed her.
sentences.cn: 安妮喜欢蒂姆，虽然他经常使她心烦。

sentences.en: Costello later apologized, saying he'd been annoyed by the man.
sentences.cn: 科斯特洛后来表示了歉意，说他是被那人惹怒的。

sentences.en: He can hardly be other than annoyed about it.
sentences.cn: 他当然只会对此感到烦恼.

sentences.en: He was annoyed to learn that the train would be delayed.
sentences.cn: 他听说火车要晚点,心里感到烦恼.

sentences.en: He was annoyed with me for having said the wrong thing.
He was beginning to get very annoyed with me about my carelessness.
sentences.cn: 因为我粗心大意，他已开始恼火了。

sentences.en: I imagine she was pretty annoyed when she found out.
sentences.cn: 我想她发现此事后一定很生气.

sentences.en: I was annoyed by hecklers during the last half of my speech.
sentences.cn: 我在作后半部分报告时,对质问者感到厌烦.

sentences.en: I'm very annoyed at your rashness.
sentences.cn: 你那么鲁莽真让我生气.

sentences.en: I’ll be annoyed if we don’t finish by eight.
sentences.cn: 如果我们8点还未完成，我会生气的。

sentences.en: She tapped her forehead and looked annoyed with herself.
sentences.cn: 她拍打着脑门，看上去在生自己的气。

sentences.en: The affectations in the way she speaks annoyed me.
sentences.cn: 她说话时装腔作势的样子惹我恼火.

sentences.en: The babble of voices in the next compartment annoyed all of us.
sentences.cn: 隔壁的车厢隔间里不间歇的嘈杂谈话声让我们都很气恼.

sentences.en: The winner's complacent smile annoyed some people.
sentences.cn: 胜利者 洋洋自得 的微笑使某些人深感厌恶.

sentences.en: Their ceaseless noise annoyed the neighbours.
sentences.cn: 他们吵闹不停,打搅了邻居.

sentences.en: You were obviously annoyed that the child had happened along.
sentences.cn: 那孩子突然地出现你显然很生气.

words.tran_cn: 使烦恼；打扰（annoy的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 使烦恼，使恼怒，干扰，打扰(annoy的过去式和过去分词)
